replies.body: How does an X simply become a Z...

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Apex,realm=NA,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=h0d7VYNo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-22T04:31:27.182+0000)
>
> How does an X simply become a Z...

X occasionally makes a Z sound, as in "Xayah" or "Xerath" (or "xylophone," if you prefer a real word).
